title: What songs are sung in G major? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any song can be sung in G. If it was originally written for another key, it can be transposed. The chords on my tenor guitar for the key of G were the first ones I learned, and are the easiest for me to play. So, I transpose everything into G and sing away. Some songs come out too high, but this can usually be remedied by singing them an octave lower. By Lowell Levinger - http://www.vintageinstruments.com(Original text:  ), CC BY-SA 3.0, File:1932 Martin 0-18 T Sunburst Tenor Guitar.jpg

Far, far too many to list. Most bluegrass and old time tunes for a start, and many others. G is an easy key on the guitar. Also any song can be transposed to any key, so you could sing any or all songs in G major.
